text: Latirolagena is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Species== Species within the genus Latirolagena include: * Latirolagena smaragdula (Linnaeus, 1758) ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Latirolagena
